rows.label: qev013305_MSG0089
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey there. You come all this way just to bail my
butt out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ugh. Not only can I not keep my own people safe,
I make other BLADEs risk their necks to save mine.
I'm worthless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0010
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Corwin he isn't worthless.

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0020
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Corwin that kind of attitude makes him worthless.

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0003
rows.name: Everyone's dead but me. That demon killed them all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0004
rows.name:
Least I could've done was lead the charge.
I'll never forgive myself for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0005
rows.name:
Good! Don't stop. I deserve so much worse!
Oh, why was I the only one to live?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0006
rows.name:
My whole team is dead—slaughtered by that demon.
I think I may be sick...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0007
rows.name:
Some of them were like Peter—joked that if they saw
that black Skell, they'd be halfway to New LA before
I even noticed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0008
rows.name:
They should have run. They were right. Nothing matters
if you don't survive. So why did Galileo have to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0009
rows.name:
They all formed a shield so I could run.
That thing's bullets tore right through them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0010
rows.name:
That was MY job! It should have been ME shielding
THEM! I'm the one who should be dead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0030
rows.name: Admonish

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0031
rows.name: Encourage Corwin to get back on his feet.

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0040
rows.name: Berate

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0041
rows.name: Reprimand Corwin for wallowing in self-pity.

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0011
rows.name: I appreciate it. Really. But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0012
rows.name:
What's left to me now? I have nothing.
No one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0013
rows.name: You're a tough one... But me? I'm over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0014
rows.name: ...What? What do you mean, I still have a purpose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0015
rows.name: I'm...the only one who can rebuild the team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0016
rows.name: Oh, what about Bates? Is Bates alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, I guess if there's still a rook who needs to be
pounded into shape...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0018
rows.name:
Sorry, you're right. Times like these are when I need to
keep it together the most.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0019
rows.name:
I have to overcome every trial, no matter how painful.
I'd expect no less of my team, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0021
rows.name:
Guess we should take a look at the mouth of the cave,
see what we're up against.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I AM getting out of here alive. I carry the weight
of my whole team now, and I'm not stopping until
I can lay it to rest back in the last human city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Think she gave up and left?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0024
rows.name: Not likely, insect! Aaaaah ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0025
rows.name:
You should have given up and added yourself to the
body pile when it would have been quick![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0026
rows.name:
But no! You weren't content with just sniffing around
where you don't belong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0027
rows.name:
You had the gall to scuttle around and waste my time!
And now I'll show you what happens for it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0028
rows.name:
You know, if it's a bother, we can just leave and you
can get back to whatever you—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ha! Funny jokes from the bug who used his underlings
as a meat shield! They were big talkers too, your men.
...Briefly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0030
rows.name:
"As long as the boss lives, so does our dream!
Death can't take it!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0031
rows.name:
...What did you think? That was supposed to be the
one called Galileo. Pretty good, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0032
rows.name:
Oh, but I spent quite some time on that one.
He wasn't so brave by the end—mostly just a bunch
of pathetic sobbing and wailing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0033
rows.name: I'm gonna tear your heart clean ou—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0034
rows.name:
He spoke of a dream? Insects don't DESERVE to dream!
And I'll enjoy watching the hope drain out of you, too,
along with the last of your blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0035
rows.name:
[ST:playername ]...I'll handle the small fry.
Think you can take out the big dog?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and give a confident thumbs-up.

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0060
rows.name: Refrain

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0061
rows.name: Suggest a cautious approach.

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0036
rows.name: All right then. Let's do this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0037
rows.name: Since when were you the cautious type?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0038
rows.name: Sorry, but we don't have much choice. Let's do this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0039
rows.name: You... I remember you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0040
rows.name:
Came all this way to be added to my collection,
did you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0041
rows.name:
Heh. Well, it would be cruel to deny you.
I will enjoy watching you writhe on the pin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'll have you die cursing the very day you were born!
NOW COME AT ME![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0043
rows.name:
That was...some fight. I can't believe you beat
that monster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0044
rows.name: At least now the men I lost can rest a little easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0070
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0071
rows.name: Remind Corwin of his promise.

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0080
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Corwin about the dream Tempera mentioned.

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0045
rows.name: ...You're right. I have a promise to keep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0046
rows.name:
We all swore we wouldn't stop until we'd seen every
inch of this planet and laid all its secrets bare.
...That's on me now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0047
rows.name:
The day we formed the team, we all swore we wouldn't
stop until we'd seen every inch of Mira and laid all her
secrets bare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0048
rows.name:
This rock is like a giant ball of mysteries.
What explorer wouldn't share that dream?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0049
rows.name:
So yes—Mira is our dream. And it will be for as long
as I'm around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0050
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0051
rows.name:
...All right. Ready to head back to NLA? I'm in a hurry
to start picking up the pieces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0052
rows.name:
Combat skill, decisiveness, an iron spirit...
You've got everything a BLADE needs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0053
rows.name:
Next time I hear people telling tales about how great
you are, I'll be sure to let 'em know they aren't
sensationalized enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0054
rows.name:
Just know that my team won't sit back and let you hog
all the adventure. Mira's mysteries are ours if we can
claim them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0055
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0056
rows.name:
Hey there. You come all this way just to bail my
butt out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0057
rows.name:
Ugh. Not only can I not keep my own people safe,
I make other BLADEs risk their necks to save mine.
I'm worthless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0090
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Corwin he isn't worthless.

rows.label: qev013305_JNK0100
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013305_SEL0101
rows.name: Tell Corwin that kind of attitude makes him worthless.

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0058
rows.name: Everyone's dead but me. That demon killed them all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0059
rows.name:
Least I could've done was lead the charge.
I'll never forgive myself for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0060
rows.name:
Good! Don't stop. I deserve so much worse!
Oh, why was I the only one to live?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0061
rows.name:
My whole team is dead—slaughtered by that demon.
I think I may be sick...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0062
rows.name:
Some of them were like Peter—joked that if they saw
that black Skell, they'd be halfway to New LA before
I even noticed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0063
rows.name:
They should have run. They were right. Nothing matters
if you don't survive. So why did Galileo have to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0064
rows.name:
They all formed a shield so I could run.
That thing's bullets tore right through them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0065
rows.name:
That was MY job! It should have been ME shielding
THEM! I'm the one who should be dead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0090
rows.name: Oh, what about Bates? Is Bates alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0071
rows.name: ...He died in Cauldros?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0072
rows.name: Then there's nothing left. That monster took everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0073
rows.name:
No sense holding on to my own life now. Time to send
up one last spark and join my men on the other side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0074
rows.name: ...You take care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0075
rows.name:
I'm off to show that thing what it means to cross me
and my team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0076
rows.name:
Where are you, demon?! I won't let you run from me!
GET OUT HERE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0077
rows.name: Noisy little insect. Are you so eager to die?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0078
rows.name: You should have run when you had the chance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0079
qev013305_MSG0080
rows.name:
"As long as the boss lives, so does our dream!
Death can't take it!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0081
rows.name:
...What did you think? That was supposed to be the
one called Galileo. Pretty good, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0082
rows.name:
Oh, but I spent quite some time on that one.
He wasn't so brave by the end—mostly just a bunch
of pathetic sobbing and wailing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0083
rows.name:
I'm going to drag you to hell with me!
All the pain they felt will be inflicted on you TENFOLD![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0084
rows.name: NRAAAAAUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0085
rows.name: Ahhh ha ha ha ha ha! Fragile little fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0086
rows.name:
You insects are worthless to the end.
At least entertain me before you die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0087
rows.name:
Your pathetic little bodies aren't even worth collecting.
I'll crush your kind to dust![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013305_MSG0088
rows.name:
And you? I'll have you die cursing your own birth!
NOW COME AT ME![ST:wait ]
